name: Classic Missile Game
description:
A clone of the classic Missile Command arcade game.

Defend Six cities using three anti-ballistic missile launchers. Earn a new city every 10k points. See how many points you can get before they're all destroyed.

Controls
Q/1 - Left Launcher
W/2 -Middle Launcher
E/3 - Right Launcher

High score can be reset on main menu with Shift + R.

WARNING: Contains flashing images
